mapper.insert: INSERT INTO windy_api.interface_info (name, `describe`, method, url, params, requestHeader, responseHeader, userId) VALUE (#{name}, #{describe}, #{method}, #{url}, #{params}, #{requestHeader}, #{responseHeader}, #{userId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, `describe`, method, url, params, requestHeader, responseHeader FROM windy_api.interface_info WHERE status = 1 AND isDelete = 0
